about_the_game:
Deatbeat Wizard follows the story of Garth, a wizard detective, and his trusty familiar Pigeon. Join them as they investigate places of occult mystery, uncovering conspiracies that the rest of the world either ignores or doesn't believe.

Deadbeat Wizard is an Action-RPG that places you in control of Garth as he ventures into places where mysteries lie. Fight enemies, solve puzzles and find clues to resolve what is happening.

Deadbeat Wizard is an episodic game, with each episode being the investigation of the conspiracies location.

Meet Garth


This is Garth, he's a bit of a Deadbeat and definitely hasn't slept enough in the last few days. While most people miss the signs of a bigger mystery, Garth is able to see the truth... or at least know when there is something to dig into. He enjoys nothing more than a nice cup of Mo'joe and eating pizza from the comforts of his lounge, but when the red string on his conspiracy board begins to line up, Garth don's his hat and heads out to (probably while trespassing) solve the mystery.

Meet Pigeon


This is Pigeon, Garth's trusty flying rat familiar. Pigeon doesn't really understand the idea of personal property and recently brought Garth a shirt he found from a person sleeping in the alleyway out back. While many people aren't able to follow Garths crazy rambling, Pigeon is able too with uncanny awareness... or he just nods and agrees with whatever Garth says, we aren't too sure.
Pigeon thinks of himself as the brains to Garths muscles, being the smart one in this dynamic duo.
